tool.name: ParameterIterator
tool.description: produce an iteration over a defined parameter

param.name: parameter_name
param.label: Choose the format of the expression data
param.help: Use compressed txt, Scanpy or Seurat objects

param.name: step
param.label: Step
param.help: Increment to use from first to last value

param.name: end_value
param.label: Ending value
param.help: Final value for the parameter. The final value is not included if increments of step don't match the last value.

tool.help: .. class:: infomark **What it does** Given an Ensembl GTF file, it will extract the list of all gene identifiers in the GTF to a simple tsv file. **Inputs** * Ensembl GTF file ----- **Outputs** * Gene identifier list in tsv.
